Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel EOS-T4i 18-55 Package
Reviews.Author: Arthur B. Friday "Quality Buff"
Reviews.Content: I am entirely pleased with the T4i and the lenses - 18-55, 75-300, 58mm Wide angle and the 58mm 2x. The other accessories - filters, 2 batteries, 2 chargers etc. are what I chose for this package and I am not disappointed. Delivery was timely and surprised me as it got to me from my the Supplier via my Miami Sky-box, to Trinidad in exactly 9 days...with the delivery time they targeted for delivery to Miami spot-on time.My one disappointment is that the full-sized tripod is a sub-standard product that I will not use for my T4i nor my SONY Camcorder as it is most unstable. I have one of those already and I use it to mount a small LED light when shooting, so this one will also be thrown into light-mount service. I must now purchase a seriously sturdy tripod for my T4i as my other one I use for my Canon G9 camera and the SONY Camcorder.All in all I am quite pleased...it was a good purchase.Canon EOS Rebel T4i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm EF-S IS II Lens & Canon 75-300 Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory+ 2 Extra Batteries + Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + UV Filter + Full Size...

Reviews.Title: Great camera - be aware of recalled bodies and noisy lenses
Reviews.Author: J. O. Vancleave
Reviews.Content: many of these cheap package deals will send you a recalled camera even after you ask them not to - like me.  Canon fixed it in 10 days - no cost to me. (handle grips can give you a rash and turn white.)Also if you are buying the T4i  - DO NOT GET ANY LENS, BUY ONLY STM LENSES!!!!The new AF feature during video means that any non-STM lens will stutter loudly during filming and the video will be useless!I recommend the 18-135 STM lens - especially if you like a good range and prefer not to carry additional lenses.

Reviews.Title: Almost 100% satisfied.
Reviews.Author: sergiojaviercaz
Reviews.Content: The camera and the kit arrived perfectly and on time, however there was a little difference between the the offer and the actual one because there was only one extra battery instead of two.Additionally, I think that by mistake they sent two sets of 3 pieces of filters instead of one, while the UV filter was not in the box.The product itself is really great, I am not a photo professional, but as a begginer I enjoyed very much the camera and the accessories, having really goods results in my first pictures.

Reviews.Title: One Amazing Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera since this past Monday 12/10/12 but boy do I love it!  I had a 35mm camera a long time ago that I used some for vacations and the like. Because of the cost of buying and developing film I didn't experiment much with it.  After my last debacle with my camcorder, where the sun washing out the LCD screen caused me to miss some once in a life time shots and video, I decided it was time for a good camera that would take stills and video.  I was looking at either Canon or Nikon.  After watching some commercials on the Canon and reading and comparing both I decided that the Canon was the better choice because of the faster fps continuous shooting and better video and still color rendering and many more features.  I now love the world of DSLR! You can play and experiment all day and if the pictures are bad just delete them!  Because it has been so long since I was serious about the art of taking pictures I have to get up to speed once again and this is the perfect camera for it.  If I want to take great pictures all I have to do is put it in auto and zoom and press the shutter button.  On the other hand if I want to go for special effects I can take more control and set the camera up manualy.  It has many features that set up automatically ie: landscape, sports, hand held night, portrait and more.  This camera has SO MANY features that it will take me some time to learn them.  But the best news is that I am having fun doing it.  It is simple enough for a beginner, like me, or for someone who is more advanced.  I would recommend that if you get this camera also purchase David Busch's guide CANON EOS REBEL T4i/650D DIGITAL SLR PHOTOGRAPHY.  It is 500 pages on nothing but this camera and all of it's operations from A to Z.  Lots of illustrations and way better than trying to read the small factory manual.  As for all the other items in the bundle I had no problems.  The box arrived with everything that was listed in it.Cons:  The camera bag and tripod are too small for this camera and all the items.  I bought extra the Amazon basic backpack and it holds all of this and more.  I already have a bigger tripod, for my small camcorder, so I will now use the tripod that came with this bundle for the camcorder and my bigger tripod for this camera.  The other con is shipping.  You have only one option and that is 3 to 5 days.  I thought, at first, that wasn't too bad.  But I discovered what that really means is that they take 3 to 5 days to " START " to ship it.  It was a week between ordering and arrival.  If you are in a hurry there is no other option.  In conclusion I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CAMERA!!  I've been like a kid in a candy store this week and dream of taking pictures with it at night!  If you are looking for a DSLR that can make you look like a Pro then this is the camera for you.  Don't bother looking any more unless you want different lenses.  This is the best $1000+ that I have every spent and I would do it again in a heart beat!

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Dusty "If you are living life like there is n...
Reviews.Content: If you are thinking about getting a DSLR stop thinking and just do it. I love this camera, do not let the size and all the controls scare you from getting this it is simply amazing what you can do with a real camera I highly advise you to get this one the Canon T4i. This kit comes with almost everything you will need. You will need to buy a camera bag and a tripod, the kit includes these but they are not good at all and the tripod it comes with is a joke I would not put my point and shoot camera on it. It was really weak and should not have been included in the package. Other than that everything else is great. I would recommend this to any one who is even sightly thinking about getting a DSLR just do it.

Reviews.Title: A great camera and everything else is just ok
Reviews.Author: Jamal, Barbados
Reviews.Content: The reason why I ordered this bundle is because I wanted to replace my T3i which was damaged. They had a special on and when I did the math, I was getting extras that I planned to buy anyway like the 75-300 lens and the extra batteries for a lot less than it would cost if I bought them all separately.The T4i is a really good camera. I already have a lot of equipment which fits it already. The video quality is amazing. It isn't a game changing update from the T3i but it still has some noticeable improvements.My issue is the rest of the stuff. The tripod is weak and appears unstable (I will probably use it as a GoPro handle). The wide angle and telephoto lens attachments are terrible. The wide angle attachment while it is wider as advertised, it gives an unwanted effect of rounding the photos in the corners. The telephoto attachment on the other hand, you get a couple more millimeters zoom but you lose a lot of sharpness. The bag is really small and the SD card is a brand I've never heard of.This is an ok bundle but not an exceptional one because it just has to many things that I will never use. But again, I got it on special.

Reviews.Title: Main Product is great, accessories are cheap/ will break.
Reviews.Author: Chris L.
Reviews.Content: This would've gotten 5 stars but......the camera bag will not protect your new expensive camera and lenses at all, very loose and could fall out. Tripod already broke, luckily the camera wasn't on it. Also, if you think you are gettinfg a deal on this during Black Friday, you're not; which I thought I was. The price dropped for this package about $200 in late January up to now. All in all, not bad with all the other accessories for a beginning photographer, just make sure you buy yourself a quality bag to protect the camera/ lenses. Using the one that comes in this kit, will cost you a new camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, but....
Reviews.Author: Keim Photo
Reviews.Content: The Canon t4i is spectacular, great features and wonderful user options.  The only reason I didn't give a 5 star review are the accessories that came with it.  The bag is nice but I wouldn't store my camera in it, but I do use it to cart around my mic and some extra accessories that can be purchased extra.  I wouldn't put a GoPro on the tripod, for fear of it collapsing.  It's very flimsy, but get you can find an extra use for it, I've used it to hold a clamp light...because its all I'd trust to put on my.  Filters and batteries have been super useful, a great product and if you're just starting out in photography, then this is the package for you!

Reviews.Title: Best investment ever
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera because I was taking good pictures with my phone. And I love taking pictures. I saw this deal on amazon and had to have it. I saved for about three months to get it and now I take it everywhere with me. At first I was using the auto focus because I was still new to dslr's. But Canons are really great for that. My first pictures came out really great. Then I started messing with the manual focus and now I can really get a shot from me. Plus with the extra lens that comes with this package you can get up close shots from things that are way to far away. I am very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend anyone to get it.

Reviews.Title: Chain Saw Bob
Reviews.Author: Chain Saw Bob
Reviews.Content: There is a LOT of camera for the money. Lots of items that you wouldn't think about until you had it for a week or month.  This should be the last camera I will need to buy my wife.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera bundle!
Reviews.Author: smsholar
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to Ireland and to eventually learn a little more about photography.  The vacation pictures came out great and I am very pleased with all the equipment I got for the price I paid.  Some of the items were lower quality like the camera bag and tripod but I planned on buying that stuff separately anyway.  I loved having 3 batteries so I never missed pictures due to dead battery on my trip and enjoyed using all the lenses that came with the kit....although I am still figuring out how to use them.  Love the camera and the entire bundle!!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the camera with some caveats about the accesories. Updated.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Younken
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for @ 3 weeks. I am an audio professional who has always wanted to get into photography for the creative enjoyment of it. I bought this camera package on the recommendation of a friend who I work with who is a professional videographer. He bought the same package. The camera has been a joy. I Love it! The photo quality I'm getting is stunningly beautiful even with the kit lenses. I've mainly been using it as a still camera with plans to get into the video capabilities soon.Regarding the accessories in the package is where I have mixed feelings. I give the camera and the lenses 5 stars but for the accessories I'd take off half a star if I could.There are a ton of extras that are things one needs along with the camera when you are starting out like me. That said, I wonder if it might have been better off buying these accessories separately to ensure quality and/or maybe even save money by not buying some of them. Can't say I've gone into the cost comparisons BUT this is what I experienced...The good: The main 2 lenses that come with the camera work well. The lens filter protectors seem fine. The 3 rechargeable batteries, wall charger and 32 GB flash card are great.The shaky: The main tripod is as flimsy and cheap as you can imagine. It may be good for holding a light but I prefer using natural light so it's useless to me. The wide angle attachment exhibits a vignette in the widest position (useless). The camera bag so far is adequate but I know sometime when I am in a hurry to zip the zipper to change a lens to get a shot, it is going to break - sooner than later. The card reader does not fit between my other connectors on my MacBook Pro but I had a USB extension cable. The only problem is: between the card reader not holding the card firmly and the somewhat shaky connection between the USB extension and the card reader, I get the message that I improperly removed the card a lot which scares me that I could lose some files when this happens.I have not used the car charger which is a great thing to have or the telephoto extender (the 75mm - 300mm seems long enough). The table top tripod is cool but too small for the camera it came with (appropriate for a point and shoot), I haven't tried all of the filters either.So, it comes with a lot of good extras and maybe I could have saved some money by buying them separately and not buying some I don't think I need. On the other hand it did cover a lot of bases for what a beginner needs that one might not think of and in the long run learning what you need and don't need is part of the process.Update: After having this package for a few months I want to say unequivocally this is a great deal. Regardless of things I am not happy with the quality of (tripod, the filters are not good, I've tried all of them and lens attachments are useless too) the things I really cared about (camera & lenses) are fantastic and well worth the price even without these extras. I also finally, got the SD card to slide directly into my MacBook Pro and it works like a charm now.This is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera, super deal!!
Reviews.Author: Mark Schofield
Reviews.Content: kit came with everything you could possibly want with this phenomenal camera. only negative is the 75-300mm lens is not image stabilized- i tend to shake a little, but it was not labeled as such in the product description, so no misleading info there on the part of the seller. everything was brand new, as described, and shipped very quickly in plenty of time for christmas. i am very pleased with this purchase, and my photographer wife was absolutely thrilled with this camera and all the goodies that came with it.

Reviews.Title: I just need time to play
Reviews.Author: Novice camera buff
Reviews.Content: The order came quickly and as listed on Amazon! I am so impressed with the quality of pictures taken with this camera! I just need time to play with my new camera!

Reviews.Title: Canon t4i camera kit
Reviews.Author: Richard T. Labus
Reviews.Content: Great camera, lens are good, some of the gadgets I may not use very often but I guess there ok.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Castlewood
Reviews.Content: Camera came 2 days early. Exactly what I expected. Excellent camera,good lenses, and good aftermarket extras (Extra battery, extra charger, class 10 32G card, ect).  Everything is good except the camera case I wouldn't trust to hold a disposable camera safely and a tripod that might work for a small point and shoot.  It is still a good value even if you throw the junk away.

Reviews.Title: incomplete list of accessories
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Ossandon
Reviews.Content: incomplete list of accessories:were not dispatched the following products 1- Ac/DC Rapid Battery Charger 1- UV, Florescent, Polarizer Filter Kit 1- Lens/LCD Cleaning KitT4i camera is very good option for entry level in the world of DSLR !CONS: AF in video record is  poor and noisy, don't waste your time use manual focus!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera and bundle
Reviews.Author: Andrew Doekes
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that I LOVE THIS CAMERA! I know nothing about cameras and this one is super easy to use and produces excellent pictures in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Generally speaking, Perfect
Reviews.Author: Marshall
Reviews.Content: Brand new camera and lenses, everything is packed in original box. Delivery is satisfying. Generally speaking, this kit is perfect. However, I didn't receive any extra batteries. This is the only thing I'm not satisfied with.

Reviews.Title: Superb value for money
Reviews.Author: Giles "Giles"
Reviews.Content: I didn't need a SLR camera for anything I do - I simply wanted one! I was blown away by the features of this package deal - the caemra itself is sublime, even a rank amateur photographer like me can take awesome photos now. The combination of lenses covers me for just about any eventuality. My only disappointment was the bag that came with the package - it is way too thin in the padding department to protect my new toy. Other than that though I am ecstatic with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: To those who rated this product page with a 3 star or lower I ask:
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: WHAT IS THE PROBLEM WITH THIS KIT?!!!!!This is a fantastic package provided by 6AVE.Not only did I receive my kit just less than 24 hours after I ordered it. Everything was there and everything works perfectly. I even find the tripod that they provided to function great.while it is in the skinny side with the legs and I most likely will buy a better quality tripod in the near future, I had NO PROBLEMS using it. It is a good starter tripod considering the price that they are giving us. Also, I heard complaints about the bag being small. Mines works great and fits everything that they provided.Of course that could be that they changed the bag that was provided from previous packages. Overall, I loved the Bundle package and this will go down as my BEST online service to date. I have been ordering online for over a decade and I don't know if I had service this great and rapid.Thanks 6AVE/Amazon. You will be getting my service (and others recommended by me) very soon.Cheers!!!

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love
Reviews.Author: Casey Good
Reviews.Content: the only reason why it didn't get 5 stars is because the camera bag this comes with felt like it was never going to protect the camera, and it only lasted 2 months before falling apart.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy.
Reviews.Author: Nick Oliveira
Reviews.Content: On time and just like it was shown however the camera is refurbished. This is a very good buy for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Is it Christmas?
Reviews.Author: khicks
Reviews.Content: So, I haven't even begun to take photos but this bundle makes you feel like it's Christmas. I ordered this on Tuesday and received it today, Thursday. At first glance, as a beginner, everything looks good. No, the bag isn't big and the tripod isn't that great but everything else will be of great value and use to you. The 3rd and 4th lenses are non-name brand as are the other accessories. The only Canon products are the body and 2 main lenses. As a bonus they included 2 memory cards, which is great. I look forward to becoming a pro with the help of these items.

Reviews.Title: Delivery was not early but timely
Reviews.Author: Richard R. Martin "Disneydad"
Reviews.Content: The camera and the basic lenses were as expected. That's the good part. The remainder of the bundle was less than I was led to expect, somewhat on the cheap side. The whole package was a reasonable price but quality was less than implied. Shipping was held 'til the last possible date to arrive "on time".

Reviews.Title: EASY TO LOVE IT .
Reviews.Author: MATHEW AURELIUS
Reviews.Content: TAKES GREAT NIGHT PICTURES AT CLUBS JOHNNY WINTER FOR INSTANCE . ALSO SURFING PICTURES IN EARLY MOURNING IN H.B .

Reviews.Title: Awesome DSLR!
Reviews.Author: Dave L
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a good price. I would have given the bundle 5 stars but the tripod was pretty substandard.

Reviews.Title: My first DSLR
Reviews.Author: Kirti Patel
Reviews.Content: wow... what a difference between cheap camera and DSLR. I love this Canon because it will shoot continiously with flash on which is something missing in Nikon. I love touch screen with 360 rotate screen. overall gr8 Camera.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T4i
Reviews.Author: K Alam
Reviews.Content: The photo quality of rebel T4i is excellent and the offer came with a lot of extras. In a single word, I will say 'Excellent'

Reviews.Title: t4i package
Reviews.Author: J.P. Second
Reviews.Content: Great camera it takes great photos and is easy to use in auto mode.  While, still having all the advanced features.  IIncluded lens very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle
Reviews.Author: Mohinder
Reviews.Content: Great Bundle its a value pack, will recommend to all go for it. Pics are stunning.Carrying Bag need to be bought though

Reviews.Title: CANON CAMERA TOPS
Reviews.Author: LYNETTE L NARUO
Reviews.Content: Great price for the whole package.  So much included in the kit.  I would definitely recommend this product for those of you who want a quality product at a good price.

Reviews.Title: rebel T4i
Reviews.Author: Steve Hoag
Reviews.Content: I liked it because its a little out of my league not really sure how to use it and the direction don't really explain it very well

Reviews.Title: Excelent purchase
Reviews.Author: Santiago Monteverde
Reviews.Content: Very nice set for people that intend to start taking "more professional" pictures! Easy to use with high quality pictures.Got it 1 day before promissed!

Reviews.Title: everything is great
Reviews.Author: drew
Reviews.Content: everything is great and for what i got was a great deal. even tho the table tripod doesnt work with the weight of the camera and the "full sized" one has to be just right to counter the weight of the camera as well. the camera bag is too small for everything in this package but good to take when you only plan taking the minimum.  i do love having 3 batteries and 2 chargers and its great that it comes with an sd card even tho i believe i need a faster one for this camera to take the pictures its ment to take. over all this is a great deal for the price and i wasnt buying it for the bag and tripods in the first place. but if saw everything in person prior to purchase i might have went with a different package.

Reviews.Title: Cool Purchase
Reviews.Author: Diego J
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this purchase. The camera is awesome!I disllike the tripod, is for a compact camera or something, but the rest of package is very usefull.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Ronald W. Kilgore
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that would take me beyond just point-and-shoot but not requiring hours and hours to learn the basics.I have taken thousands of pictures so far and continue learning the finer points of the system. I recommend this setup for the amateur photographer who wants to move up to better quality and versatility without having to pay a lot more for a pro model.

Reviews.Title: excellet product
Reviews.Author: Sergio A. Rosales
Reviews.Content: The camera and lens it is excelent buy. As the previuos rebel camera have a good image and excelente software.

Reviews.Title: Excellent set of products
Reviews.Author: ricardo
Reviews.Content: I am  very pleased with this purchase. The set has everything I needed for my hobby and more. I recomend it

Reviews.Title: The BEST deal you can spend your money on!
Reviews.Author: Pat Joseph
Reviews.Content: We have an earlier generation Rebel camera and was considering an upgrade.  We needed a video camera and what do you know, got the best of both worlds with the T4i.  All the accessories you get for under $1000, you just can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Canon T4i!
Reviews.Author: NVR4MONEY
Reviews.Content: I bought this mainly for the camera, batteries and Canon lenses. Those items are great. The chargers are fine. The bag is too small, the tripod isn't solid enough, the micro and macro lenses aren't Canon. Still, the price point was very good and I do not regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love this bundle
Reviews.Author: Silver Dog
Reviews.Content: I was slightly apprehensive about ordering such an expensive item site unseen, but went ahead anyway because I hate going shopping.  I was amazed and very, very pleased with the Canon T4i bundle that I received.  I received it several days earlier than I expected from Cardinal Camera. I would not hesitate to recommend this seller to anyone.  The items came double boxed.  Everything was well wrapped and there was no damage.  I received all of the items listed and I am pleased with the whole order.  Thank you Cardinal Camera and Amazon

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect! The products were brand new in the boxes. The case was kind of cheap and the tripod was flimsy, but everything else was wonderful. I will buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bundle
Reviews.Author: Patty Hankey
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me for Christmas and I love it! I have been using it for just over 2 months now and I still have a lot to learn but it is an excellent camera/bundle for a reasonable price. We have a 7 year old son who will be involved is a lot of school activities and I wanted a camera that will allow me to capture them all and this is the one! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great deal.
Reviews.Author: Isaac at Exit
Reviews.Content: I didn't know exactly what I needed, but I wanted the rebel 4ti to begin shooting some serious photos.  This is a great starter kit for beginners.

Reviews.Title: excelent product
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: Im just trying to get a better looking for this camera is amazing and has tremendous eye for good photos

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Russ DeVries
Reviews.Content: great buy love the camera and every thing in the package seem to be all good quality but the tri pod seems a lil cheap but still well worth the price

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Timothy Savas
Reviews.Content: I love this combo pack. The camera bag and tripod I WOULD NEVER USE, but I already have those things. The filters are a plus, and the extra batteries are being used in a twin battery grip. Pictures, if taken correctly, are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Ob
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended, and I'm so satisfied. I liked the whole package, it was worth the price i paid for it.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it!
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas.  He was totally amazed when he opened it.  He could hardly wait to use it.  After being together for 11 years, he said this was the best present ever!!  We live in a very scenic area, so there are always photo ops for him.  Thank you Canon for making this product!

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: received everything as expected and the Price was amazing as well! Company sent everything on time and all products inside package were great. Had to buy a bigger camera bag though because the bag provided did not hold all equipment, otherwise very happy.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Roland M. Barrett "Rollie2t"
Reviews.Content: Canon has done it's homework with this product. This is my second "Rebel" and  I am extremely pleased with the operation and quality of pictures. I was really impressed with the 300mm lens. The only problem was the bag is not large enough to accomodate all the lenses and the camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Marsha Jennings
Reviews.Content: Love it! Wish the tripod and bag were better but love the camera! Extra batteries were great as well !

Reviews.Title: Canon Bundle
Reviews.Author: david meyer
Reviews.Content: Overall a solid bundle. Like the other reviews a few items are not amazing, but you can easily use them for something else. I used the bag for my psp/ds. Fast shipping with signature confirmation.

Reviews.Title: I love the camera but probably would not go with such a kit.
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Knowing what I know now I would choose more carefully what to purchase for lenses and accessories, that's not to say the included items are not good but I may not use all the items.

Reviews.Title: Lack of Instructional (functional) Material
Reviews.Author: W. Clayton
Reviews.Content: I need training on how to maximize this spectacular camera. The manuels don't do it for me.  I need hands-on assistance.  I emailed Canon and no response.  Youtube was kindda helpful, however did not hit the mark.The tripods were substandard-lightweight.  I don't feel confortable using.  The omitted the large tripod and shiped it right away (+).  However, when I got it I was dissapointed.The camera and assessaries were all fine.  If I was only getting the camera, it would have been 5 stars.  Customer service was good.  I had more expectations.  Maybe I should have found out all that was included besides the ad.

Reviews.Title: def an awesome package
Reviews.Author: Duane Starkey
Reviews.Content: i consider this camera one of the top, i owned a t3i and had got it stolen on a train n prague europe, so if anyone traveling make sure u have alarms and cables and straps to u so nothig will get stolen, this package has it all, everything u need to have an all out photo lab, carninal camera is def awesome,

Reviews.Title: Return impossiblr
Reviews.Author: LESLE GIBSON
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my son. Unbeknownst to me he already received the same camera two days earlier.  I tried for about 3 weeks to return this expensive camera that I no longer needed.  I received 2 emails regarding this. One asking ifmI had original packaging. The 2nd was to say the return had been closed!  So now I am stuck with this $900.00 camera.  It is a good camera still in original packaging.  NO I am not happy.

Reviews.Title: Tripob and camera bag too small XXXXX.
Reviews.Author: cal
Reviews.Content: The tripod is way too small.  I also think the camera bag will not hold all the my supplies./ I had to order the back pack ./ Also with my handicap, I cannot carry the bag and use a crutch at the same time, or take pictures withoput sitting the bag some where. Back pack is much better.Everything is exactly as bundled.

Reviews.Title: Took Wonderful pictures on a cruise
Reviews.Author: Gary J. De Bacco
Reviews.Content: A lot to learn about this camera as it does a lot of things.  Took 600 or so pictures on a cruise and the resolution and sharpness of the pictures are very good. Took most of them on the automatic mode. I havent used the close up or the wide angle lenses yet. The telephoto lense works good. Having two batterys is very good. I already had a large camera case and find the one that comes with this is small. I am very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: aGAIN, iT'S THE BEST!!
Reviews.Author: Edna Messer
Reviews.Content: BECAUSE IT'S THE BEST AND MY 30 YR OLD DAUGHTER REQUESTED IT FOR HER BIRTHDAY , WHICH WAS 12-7-81SHE LOVES IT bOTH HER GIRLS CHEER AND IT TAKES GREAT ACTION PICS.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T4I
Reviews.Author: Pearl Shina
Reviews.Content: I am so excited with my new camera.  I'm a little disappointed with the macro and wide angle lenses.  I was expecting actual lenses and instead I got the a conversion ring type lens.  It just screws on to the end of your regular lens and it does somewhat make the lens a wide angle or more of a macro.  But did not meet my expectations.  However, I am overall, very pleased with this product and feel it was a very good deal.  Shipping was very quick.  It was well packaged and arrived undamaged.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, 14-bit A/D conversion, ISO 100-12800; expandable to 25600 (H) for shooting from bright to dim light and high performance DIGIC 5 Image Processor for exceptional image quality and speed
High speed continuous shooting up to 5.0 fps allows you to capture all the action
Improved autofocus performance with a 9-point all cross-type AF system (including a high-precision dual-cross f/2.8 center point), and new Hybrid CMOS AF increases autofocus speed when shooting photos and movies in Live View
Enhanced EOS Full HD Movie mode with Movie Servo AF for continuous focus tracking of moving subjects, manual exposure control and multiple frame rates (1080: 30p (29.97) / 24p (23.976) / 25p, 720: 60p (59.94) / 50p, 480: 30p (29.97) / 25p)
3.0-inch Vari-angle Touch Screen Clear View LCD monitor II (approximately 1,040,000 dots) with smudge-resistant coating features multi-touch operation and Touch AF for an easy and intuitive experience, flexible positioning, and clear viewing even when outdoors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm EF-S IS II Lens (Refurbished) & Canon 75-300 Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory+ 2 Extra Batteries + Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + UV Filter + Full Size Tripod + Case +Accessory Kit
